function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor ventilaton system","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission and reduced indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Upgrade and improve ventilation system to meet health and safety standards","Technologies":"Advanced air purification systems, HEPA filters, and optimized HVAC systems","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Low indoor comfort and air quality","Impact":"Negative impact on occupants' health and well-being, increased risk of illness transmission","Mitigation":"Upgrade heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) systems, improve lighting, and control static electricity to enhance indoor comfort and air quality","Technologies":"Smart HVAC systems, air quality sensors, energy-efficient lighting, static control devices","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate control over heat supply and distribution","Impact":"Unstable indoor temperature, discomfort, and reduced thermal comfort","Mitigation":"Implement improvements to heat supply control, TABS heat supply control, heat fluid supply temperature control, and heat distribution control","Technologies":"Smart thermostat systems, radiant heating/cooling systems, zoning controls","People":"Building occupants, facility managers","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
